alert.note: Alert for Noxubee (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued April 18 at 9:20AM CDT until April 20 at 2:30AM CDT by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Mississippi... Noxubee River At Macon affecting Noxubee County. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL LATE TUESDAY NIGHT... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Noxubee River At Macon. * WHEN...Until late Tuesday night. * IMPACTS...At 26.0 feet, Low land near the river is flooded. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 9:00 AM CDT Monday the stage was 25.1 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage late this afternoon to a crest of 26.3 feet just after midnight tonight. - Flood stage is 26.0 feet. && Fld Observed Forecasts (7 am CDT) Location Stg Stg Day/Time Tue Wed Thu Noxubee River Macon 26.0 25.1 Mon 9 am CDT 26.1 23.9 21.1 &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Forecast includes rainfall on the ground and 48 hours of additional rainfall. Additional information is available at www.water.weather.gov/ahps2/index.php?wfo=JAN The next statement will be issued this evening at 900 PM CDT.
